Cmp3\Source

Class SourceAbstract

All Implemented Interfaces:

SourceInterface

Direct Known Subclasses:

Typo3Xml, DataRowMetaXml, Pdo, Content, Fetcher
public abstract class SourceAbstract
implements SourceInterface

{@inheritdoc}

Container for a content source which includes:
- configuration - content processor
After all it provides a content object ready for conversion eg. to PDF
